articles.title: Garbage Collection in Java: Choosing the Correct Collector
articles.description: Garbage collection (GC) is a type of automatic memory management and a key feature of the Java platform. The Java platform implements multiple garbage collection algorithms, making it suitable for handling all kinds of workloads.
